body: Grasshope, Make sure you have input parameter "brep" set to 'List Access' and Type Hint 'Brep' (see screen capture below). I've also added a "gridSize" input parameter so you can control the number of mesh faces. Hope this helps. /SPM [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XV4h3WhRBOFgqTbVuyRJpnxXaSwMrKHcuiu0l9etar3CmeWw4KBY8gZcbs8ND5NwqGYaSTc9*XAaPJsEwKDuBvicfyr0AaBe/brepToMesh.png)
